ComicInfo.Title: The Return of the Brain; You Can't Escape; The Dark Room!; The Girl Who Couldn't Die!
ComicInfo.Summary:
The Return of the Brain: More adventures of the evil head that lives and moves without the benefit of a body.
You Can't Escape: Breaking the fourth wall a Vampire addresses the reader, his intended victim. He tells how he first encountered his victim-to-be when he asked for help and was rebuffed. The vampire followed the reader, discovering where he lived and what comics he liked to buy. He spent considerable money printing up a custom copy of Adventures into Terror to place on the newsstand. The last panel of the story shows the vampire with claws extended and fangs bared - daring you to look over your shoulder.
The Dark Room!: A boy goes to live with his uncle who, unknown to the boy, practices black magic. The boy is saved from evil by the misshapen manservant.
The Girl Who Couldn't Die!: A phony medium unintentionally brings back the spirit of a murderess.
